text: Spratt-Allen-Aull House is a historic home located at Lexington, Lafayette County, Missouri. It was built about 1840, and is a two-story, Greek Revival style red brick dwelling. It features a colossal pedimented tetrastyle portico with a full-facade upper deck. Also on the property is the contributing octagonal, two-story frame ice house. (includes 15 photographs from 1991) It was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 1993. ==References== Category:Houses on the National Register of Historic Places in Missouri Category:Greek Revival houses in Missouri Category:Houses completed in 1840 Category:Houses in Lafayette County, Missouri Category:National Register of Historic Places in Lafayette County, Missouri
title: Spratt-Allen-Aull House
